title: Qatar - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Eligibility
items: Bangladeshi citizens must apply for a Qatar tourist visa prior to travel.
Must hold a valid UK, USA, Schengen, or Ireland visa.
Passport must be valid and available in both current and any previous versions.
Visa approval is at the discretion of the Qatar Embassy and may require a personal interview.

details.title: Required Documents
items: Scan copy of valid visa for UK, USA, Schengen, or Ireland (mandatory).

note: Chologhuri does not process urgent visas or non-tourist categories. File submission preparation takes 1–2 working days. The embassy may request additional documents. Visa issuance is not guaranteed and entirely at the discretion of the Qatar Embassy.
